attributes.action: ban all firework sales to the general public and permit licensed firework displays only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop accidental deaths and injuries. Stop anti-social use of fireworks in our streets.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to ban all firework sales to the general public and permit licensed firework displays only.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=rockets


Her Majesty's Government
